original_text: Thou hast broken down all his hedges; thou hast brought his strong holds to ruin.
korean_text: 그의 모든 울타리를 파괴하시며 그 요새를 무너뜨리셨으므로

sentences.original_text: Thou hast broken down all his hedges
thou hast brought his strong holds to ruin
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 그의 견고한 요새를 폐허로 만들었습니다
